distance.h
1#pragma once
2
3#include "sensorModel.h"
4#include "utils.h"
5
6const std::vector<std::pair<Eigen::Vector2f, Eigen::Vector2f> > WALLS = {
7 {{1.78308, 1.78308}, {1.78308, -1.78308}},
8 {{1.78308, -1.78308}, {-1.78308, -1.78308}},
9 {{-1.78308, -1.78308}, {-1.78308, 1.78308}},
10 {{-1.78308, 1.78308}, {1.78308, 1.78308}},
11};
12
13constexpr float WALL_0_X = 1.78308;
14constexpr float WALL_1_Y = 1.78308;
15constexpr float WALL_2_X = -1.78308;
16constexpr float WALL_3_Y = -1.78308;
17
24class DistanceSensorModel : public SensorModel {
25private:
26 Eigen::Vector3f sensorOffset;
27 pros::Distance distance;
28
29 QLength measured = 0.0;
30 bool exit = false;
31 QLength std = 0.0;
32
33public:
39 DistanceSensorModel(Eigen::Vector3f sensor_offset, pros::Distance distance)
40 : sensorOffset(std::move(sensor_offset)),
41 distance(std::move(distance)) {
42 }
43
47 void update() override {
48 const auto measuredMM = distance.get();
49
50 exit = measuredMM == 9999 || distance.get_object_size() < 70;
51
52 measured = measuredMM * millimetre;
53
54 std = 0.20 * measured / (distance.get_confidence() / 64.0);
55 }
56
64 [[nodiscard]] std::optional<double> p(const Eigen::Vector3f &X) override {
65 if (exit) {
66 return std::nullopt;
67 }
68
69 auto angle = X.z() + sensorOffset.z();
70
71 Eigen::Vector2f x = X.head<2>() + Eigen::Rotation2Df(X.z()) * sensorOffset.head<2>();
72
73 auto predicted = 50.0f;
74
75 if (const auto theta = abs(std::remainder(0.0f, angle)); theta < M_PI_2) {
76 predicted = std::min((WALL_0_X - x.x()) / cos(theta), predicted);
77 }
78
79 if (const auto theta = abs(std::remainder(static_cast<float>(M_PI_2), angle)); theta < M_PI_2) {
80 predicted = std::min((WALL_1_Y - x.y()) / cos(theta), predicted);
81 }
82
83 if (const auto theta = abs(std::remainder(static_cast<float>(M_PI), angle)); theta < M_PI_2) {
84 predicted = std::min((x.x() - WALL_2_X) / cos(theta), predicted);
85 }
86
87 if (const auto theta = abs(std::remainder(static_cast<float>(M_3PI_4), angle)); theta < M_PI_2) {
88 predicted = std::min((x.y() - WALL_3_Y) / cos(theta), predicted);
89 }
90
91 return cheap_norm_pdf((predicted - measured.getValue()) / std.getValue()) * LOCO_CONFIG::DISTANCE_WEIGHT;
92 }
93
94 ~DistanceSensorModel() override = default;
95};

static constexpr float DISTANCE_WEIGHT
Weight for the distance sensor. Higher means it will have a larger impact on the particle filter,...
